alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 13 at 2:45AM MST until February 14 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with 45 to 55 mph expected. Strongest gusts are expected east of Mountain Home through the Magic Valley. * WHERE...The Upper Treasure Valley from Mountain Home east, Western Magic Valley, central and eastern Owyhee County, and southern Twin Falls County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of wet snow during the strongest winds may impact travel.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
